lead_paragraph: Philadelphia Flyers center Keith Primeau has failed to receive clearance to play because of lingering effects of a concussion and is expected to announce his retirement at a news conference today at the Flyers’ practice facility in Vorhees, N.J.
snippet: Philadelphia Flyers center Keith Primeau has failed to receive clearance to play because of lingering effects of a concussion and is expected to announce his retirement at a news conference today at the Flyers’ practice facility in Vorhees, N.J.
